channel.title: Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Constantin Stamatiadis

item.description: I'm currently writing my Master Thesis at ABB's Corporate Research Center in Switzerland. The title of my thesis is "Data-Driven adaptive MPC using reinforcement learning". Previously, I completed an internship at Volkswagen AG in Germany. Where I was part of the automated driving functions team, where deep learning techniques are exploited for autonomous driving. My interest in autonomous systems is what led me to pursue the master in Robotics, Systems and Control at ETH ZÃ¼rich.
